movie.title: Vabank
movie.actors: Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Ewa Szykulska
movie.plot: Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief ...
